item.description:
Part of Ideat Village

Sandcastle competition, bring a picnic (grills provided) and "The Villains" play at 7pm!

Oh, and they're filming this...calling it the Psycho Beach Party! So I guess there's your license to act crazy!


Meet at the Harbor Pavilion...and since it's an all-day thing...who knows when I'll show up...it's bikeable from downtown new haven, just take the Rt 1 bridge to Townsend Ave.


see link above for details.

I'll be your contact: Eric- 860-two one four-9361

this isn't a "serious" event...so dress goofily, bring a snack and camera and have fun!
item.name: Lighthouse Park Psycho Beach Party 2-9pm
